name: Pantgeon
description:
Pantgeon is a game where you have to cooperate with a friend to defeat the bosses and get the best time.  

Pass the bullet through the enemy and defeat them.

Pantgeon has been made by 4 students (UCM (FDI - Madrid)) in a week (RuralJam). Hope you like it and we would love to recieve feedback to make the game better.

Follow us on twitter to stay tuned!

https://twitter.com/pantgeon
